author: makortel
body:
This PR suggests two minor simplifications to `HGCDigiProducer`
* `HGCDigitizer` can be held as a regular member (wrt. pointer)
* Use constructor delegation to avoid duplicating the `theDigitizer_` initialization

Tested in CMSSW_10_1_0, no changes expected.
title: Minor simplifications to HGCDigiProducer
